libICEpost.src.base.Functions.runtimeWarning
============================================

.. py:module:: libICEpost.src.base.Functions.runtimeWarning

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   @author: F. Ramognino       <federico.ramognino@polimi.it>
   Last update:        12/06/2023

   Functions for warnings and error messages.

-------

   libICEpost.src.base.Functions.runtimeWarning.bcolors

Module Contents
---------------

.. py:class:: bcolors

   .. py:attribute:: HEADER
      :value: '\x1b[95m'



   .. py:attribute:: OKBLUE
      :value: '\x1b[94m'



   .. py:attribute:: OKCYAN
      :value: '\x1b[96m'



   .. py:attribute:: OKGREEN
      :value: '\x1b[92m'



   .. py:attribute:: WARNING
      :value: '\x1b[93m'



   .. py:attribute:: FAIL
      :value: '\x1b[91m'



   .. py:attribute:: ENDC
      :value: '\x1b[0m'



   .. py:attribute:: BOLD
      :value: '\x1b[1m'



   .. py:attribute:: UNDERLINE
      :value: '\x1b[4m'



.. py:function:: enf(msg, style)

.. py:function:: printStack(e=None)

   Print the current call-stack. If an error was raised,
   print the traceback with the error message.


.. py:function:: baseRuntimeWarning(WarningMSG, Msg, verbosityLevel=1, stack=True)

.. py:function:: runtimeWarning(Msg, verbosityLevel=1, stack=True)

   Print a runtime warning message (Msg) and the call-stack.


.. py:function:: runtimeError(Msg, verbosityLevel=1, stack=True)

   Print a runtime error message (Msg) and the call-stack.


.. py:function:: fatalErrorIn(self, func, msg, err=None)

   Raise a RuntimeError.


.. py:function:: fatalErrorInClass(cls, func, msg, err=None)

   Raise a RuntimeError.


.. py:function:: fatalErrorInFunction(func, msg, err=None)

   Raise a RuntimeError.


.. py:function:: fatalErrorInArgumentChecking(self, func, err=None)

   Raise RuntimeError due to failing argument checking in function call.


.. py:function:: fatalError(msg, err=None)

   Raise a RuntimeError.
